def pr():
    global N
    for i in xrange(2, N/2):
        if N % i == 0:
            return False
    else:
        return True        

N = int(raw_input())
while True:
    #check for palindrome
    strN = str(N)
    if strN == strN[::-1]:
        if pr():
            print N
            break
        else:
            N += 1
    else:
        N += 1
